metadata.name: Flip-flops on Plastic Grass (Sauna)
metadata.description:
Why not flip-flops, inflatable palm trees and artificial waterfalls, if they can transport us to a hedonistic wonderland ?

The Sauna series is an intimate account of a timeless and imaginary universe on the fringes of society: a collective and yet very solitary experience. It is a surrealistic quest of the Other set in gay saunas and naturist bathhouses.

[Sauna project](https://bruchansky.name/2023/02/03/sauna-series/)
